title: 纯萌新，为什么我刚进游戏就立马闪退？
author: evil、凝夜
txt_content:
我从论坛下了个基础整合包，但为什么刚进去就闪退了，如图
还有这些：
[21:49:29] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2082ms behind, skipping 4
[21 :49:47] [main/INFO] [LiteLoader]: B aking listener list for PlayerClickListener with 0 listeners
[2149:47] [Server thre ad/INFO] [LiteLoader]: B aking listener list for PlayerInteractionListener with 0 listeners
[21:50:02] [main/INFO]: Loaded 2 advancements
[21 :50:19] [main/ERROR]: 1#1111#1### GL ERROR 1#111#1#11#
[21:50:19] [main/ERROR]: @ Post render
[21:50:19] [main/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory

[21 :50:19] [main/ERROR]: @ Post render
[21 :50:19] [main/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory
[21 :50:1 9] [main/ERROR]: ###1#### GL ERROR ###111###
[21 :50:1 9] [main/ERROR]: @ Post render
[21:50:19] [main/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory

# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.231-b11 mixed mode windows-x86 )

# C [ig9icd32.dIl+ 0x3946b]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试更新显卡驱动，并尝试卸载你现在安装的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... bf28bcb45c792fce896

或者自己找个 64 位的 java 8 安装

replies.author: evil、凝夜
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-6 22:16
尝试更新显卡驱动，并尝试卸载你现在安装的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapps/download/ ...
呃，还真是，之前傻傻的，才发现我下的是32位的，感谢
